mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, author, contents, created_at, modified_at, hits, board_type, travel_date, travel_spot, max_count, current_count) VALUES (#{title}, #{author}, #{contents}, now(), now(), 0, #{boardType}, #{travelDate}, #{travelSpot}, #{maxCount}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, author, contents,created_at, modified_at, hits, board_type, travel_date, travel_spot, max_count, current_count FROM board ORDER BY board_type DESC

SELECT id, title, author, contents,created_at, modified_at, hits, board_type, travel_date, max_count, current_count FROM board WHERE author = #{user_id} and board_type = 'recruitment' ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, title, author, contents,created_at, modified_at, hits, board_type, travel_date, travel_spot FROM board WHERE author = #{user_id} and board_type = 'review' ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, title, author, contents,created_at, modified_at, hits, board_type, travel_date, travel_spot FROM board WHERE board_type != 'recruitment' ORDER BY board_type DESC
SELECT id, title, author, contents,created_at, modified_at, hits, board_type, travel_date, travel_spot, max_count, current_count FROM board WHERE board_type != 'review' ORDER BY board_type DESC
SELECT id, title, author, contents, created_at, modified_at, hits, board_type, travel_date, travel_spot, max_count, current_count FROM board WHERE id = #{id}
